name: kakaru
trans: to take time or money--掛かかる

name: oriru
trans: to get off, to descend--降りる

name: yuubinkyoku
notation: 郵便(ゆうびん)局(きょく)

name: omawarisan
trans: friendly term for policeman--お巡まわりさん
notation: お巡(じゅん)まわりさん

name: ryuugakusei
notation: 留学生(りゅうがくせい)

name: sasu
trans: to stretch out hands, to raise an umbrella--差す

name: naku
trans: animal noise. to chirp, roar or croak etc.--鳴く

name: kiru
trans: to put on from the shoulders down--着る

name: iru
trans: to be, to have (used for people and animals)--居る

name: miru
trans: to see, to watch--見る 観る

name: aku
trans: to open, to become open--開く

name: migaku
trans: to brush teeth, to polish--磨く

name: naraberu
trans: to line up,to set up--並べる

name: haku
trans: to wear,to put on trousers--はく

name: narabu
trans: to line up,to stand in a line--並ぶ

name: rajikase / rajiokasetto
trans: radio cassette player--ラジカセ / ラジオカセット
notation: ラジカセ / ラジオカセット

name: yokka
trans: four days, fouth day of the month--四日

name: ojisan
trans: uncle, middle aged gentleman--伯父/叔父

name: yooka
trans: eight days, eighth day of the month--八日

name: hiku
trans: to play an instrument with strings, including piano--弾く

name: mikka
trans: three days, third day of the month--三日

name: shimaru
trans: to close, to be closed--閉まる

name: omoshiroi
notation: 面(めん)おも白(しろ)しろい

name: te-pu rekooda-
trans: tape recorder--テープレコーダー

name: osu
trans: to push, to stamp something--押す

name: kiku
trans: to hear, to listen to, to ask--聞く

name: ojiisan
trans: grandfather, male senior citizen--伯父/叔父

name: kesu
trans: to erase, to turn off power--消す

name: aru
trans: to be,to have (used for inanimate objects)--ある

name: kumoru
trans: to become cloudy, to become dim--曇る

name: obasan
notation: 伯母(おば)さん/叔母(おば)さん

name: futsuka
trans: two days, second day of the month--二日

name: asobu
trans: to play, to make a visit--遊ぶ

name: muika
trans: six days, sixth day of the month--六日

name: furu
trans: to fall, e.g. rain or snow--降る

name: toru
trans: to take a photo or record a film--撮る

name: tomaru
trans: to come to a halt--止まる

name: neru
trans: to go to bed,to sleep--寝る
